hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd $HOME/HOME/HadVendee_Glpi; USER=had_aloa PASS=Palmier-10 HOST=ftp.onlinux-fr.setupdns.net
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=2 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/public/glpi -X public/glpi/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='GLPI_hadvendee' WPDBVERSION=`` WPPLUGIN=`` URL='http://glpi.hadvendee.com/' TYPE='' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@dev.timotheebarreteau.fr/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL"
